txt.en: 'Clear the small camps of enemies along the exit tunnel.'
Defeat all Uruk bosses that guard the exit from the Glittering Caves ([placeholder]/4)

The time has come to prepare for the final charge out of the Glittering Caves. Dismantle the barricades and traps and clear the camps that the enemy has set up along the cave leading back out to the Deeping-coomb.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating

<rgb=#00FF00>Moderate Merit Gain:</rgb>
- Burning Debris Pile extinguished
- Barricade destroyed

<rgb=#00FF00>Minor Merit Gain:</rgb>
- Trap disarmed
'The time has come to prepare for our final charge out of the Glittering Caves. Clear the camps that the enemy has set up along the cave leading back out to the Deeping.'
Dismantle barricades, disable traps, and defeat the Uruk bosses set up on the path to the exit from the Glittering Caves
